office:text.text:p: Please see the list below for a complete listing of all vendors/devices that we have integrated with. Any vendor/device not listed would need to be researched for compatibility with our product. Check out our additional documentation that explains how to send HL7 messages to us.

MIE supports bidirectional and unidirectional Practice Management systems using ADT (demographics), SIU (scheduling), and DFT (billing) HL7 (2.x) messages. Information about supported connection-types can be found here.

text:a.text:span: Abaxis Piccolo Xpress Blood Chemistry Analyzer

text:list-item.text:p: Ambulatory Blood Pressure - SunTech Medcal Instruments Accuwin Pro Version 3 software. Device is the Oscar 2, 24 hr ABP.
Audiometer - Benson CCA-100mini Plus Industrial Audiometer with a BAS-200 Bio-Acoustic Simulator (requires Plus Package software)
Audiometer - Benson Mini 200 (requires Plus Package software)
Audiometer - Xeta Otometrics (no model # on device)
Audiometer - OMI Audiometric Data Management Software ASW2004 & ASW2210
Audiometer - Tremetrics RA300, RA400, RA500, RA800
Barcode Inventory scanner - DATALOGIC ES46080 QuickScan 6000; Class # 668112-014001-0000
Card Swipe Reader - Mag Strip and RFID MagTek Mini USB Swipe Readers (Part# 21040110)
Card Swipe Reader - OmniReader card reader: WCR3237-633U - 3 track mag stripe reader and visible bar code reader with USB/Kybd interface
Clinitek Status by Siemens - analyzer that reads urine dipsticks
ECG/EKG - Esaote 3/12 Channel ECG Unit P8000

text:a.text:span: ECG/EKG - Welch Allyn PC-based Resting ECG Monitoring (CardioPerfect)

text:list-item.text:p: ECG/EKG – Welch Allyn PC-based Resting ECG with interpretation model CPR-UI-UB-D (MIE Note: Goes through CardioPerfect)
ECG/EKG - Welch Allyn PC-based PCR100 Resting ECG w/Interp & Spiro Combo -101442 DS (MIE Note: Goes through CardioPerfect)
ECG/EKG - Welch Allyn Connex Cardio (MIE Note: goes through CardioPerfect)
Monitor and Defibrillator - Phillips HeartStart MRx (Pending)
Pulmonary - NDD EasyOne Spirometer using EasyOn software
Pulmonary - OMI Sensormedics model number 922 & PFW05-D
Respirator Fit -TSI Incorporated Portacount Pro Model 8030
Signature Pad - Topaz Systems SignatureGem LCD 1x5
SpeechMike - Philips SpeechMike USB model LFH3200
X-Ray image import from a CD or option of DICOM interface
Vital Signs Monitoring - Welch Allyn Spot Vital Signs Monitor - Welch 4200B-E1
Vital Signs Monitoring - Welch Allyn Spot Vital Signs LXi (USB connection)

text:a.text:span: Vital Signs Monitoring - Welch Allyn Vital signs 300 Series

text:p.text:span: Konica Minolta EXA PACS bi-directional (orders and results)

text:list-item.text:p: Affiliated Computer Services (ACS) – Medicare and Medicaid processing in 28 states
Docs4Docs Regenstrief uni-directional (State of Indiana) from D4D into WebChart
Indiana Health Information Exchange (IHIE/INPC) uni-directional from WebChart to IHIE
Indiana Med-Web Regional Health Information Exchange
Michigan Care Improvement Registry (MCIR) CCD Referral Documents thru MHC
Wait Time Information System (WTIS) Level 2 Surgery (OR) Specification Outbound to Canadian Ministry
Xerox (State of Wyoming HIE bi-directional and Kentucky uni-directional)

office:text.text:p: Our preferred methods of transport are HTTP Post and MLLP (secure socket communication). We can also support (but prefer not to) sFTP, SCP, and FTPs connection for unidirectional messaging.

text:list-item.text:p: Alabama ImmPrint bi-directional HL7 via HTTPS
California CAIR unidirectional (bidirectional is possible, but no clients have requested)
Florida Shots (unidirectional nightly FTP to send matching injections)
Georgia GRITS uni-directional HL7 via HTTPS
Indiana Children's Healthcare Immunization Registry Program (CHIRP) bi-directional HL7 via HTTPS
Maryland MDHD Crisp Immunization or ImmuNet
Massachusetts Immunization Information System (MIIS) via HTTPS
Michigan Care Improvement Registry (MCIR) Immunization Registry (uni-directional HL7 via HTTPS)
New Jersey Immunization Information System (NJIIS) (unidirectional via nightly sFTP)
North Carolina (CVMS) - waiting on vendor to have interface available
West Virginia thru Scientific Technologies Corp (STC)
Washington State thru Scientific Technologies Corp (STC)
Wyoming Immunization Registry (WYIIS) bi-directional HL7 via ACS HIE
**Most registries managed by STC will interface with WebChart.
St. Joseph Mercy Hospital Oakland, MI - Lab, Radiology, and Reports/Consults
Memorial Hospital of Sandusky County - (results only) Paragon Labs/SunQuest
Atlas Medical also known as iON
Assistant Pro (Urine Drug Screen results only)
Baptist Health Laboratory (results only - lab and hospital reports)
BioReference Laboratories (GenPath is owned by BioReference) (results Only)

text:p.text:span: Clinical laboratories of HI bi-directional interface (orders and results)

text:list-item.text:p: Geneva Health Solutions (results only - Cardiac Devices)

text:p.text:span: Inform Diagnostics pathology bi-directional interface (orders and results)

text:list-item.text:p: iON also known as Atlas Medical
MD State Lab (Bi-directional orders and results)
Medical Diagnostics Laboratory - A OB-GYN specialty lab (Bi-directional)
Med Labs of Arkansas (Bi-directional orders and results-including pathology)
Quest Diagnostics (Certified Bi-directional orders and results)
University of Nebraska Medical Center -- UNMC (Bi-directional orders and results)
Allscripts (we have no HL7, but can do a conversion of existing data)
VitalPath (ADT and SIU, Unidirectional: WebChart to VitalPath)
